name: Avoid using global functions
description: Using Global Functions makes the code more difficult to read and maintain. They should be avoided.
rationale: Using global functions makes the code more difficult to read, modify and much less robust. Intensive use of global functions violates the principle of Object Oriented development (encapsulation, hiding information about the implementation etc.)
total: Number of objects likely to use global functions

technicalCriteria.name: Programming Practices - Modularity and OO Encapsulation Conformity
